    Distrubute Information Collection and Analysis Platform

    Shenzhen Finance Institute,CUHK(SZ)
    2017-Present

    Distribute Information Collection and Analysis Platform collects social network information and analyzes the public sentiment exceed industrial quality. I am responsible for designing and implementing whole data pipeline including web crawling, data bus design, data warehouse design and cluster provisioning on the Aliyun.

  • Cloud Service:ECS,Resource Orchestration,Container Registry,SLB,Elasticsearch Database,Kubernetes
  • Frameworks: Scrapy Cluster, Spark Streaming, Kafka, Redis, Zookeeper, Logstash, Elasticsearch,mysql
  • The crawler can automatically login the website, retain the login session, parse the webpage content and crawl incrementally.
  • The system is designed in micro-service fashion and provisioned on the Kubernetes cluster. The system takes the advantages from Kubernetes and micro-service structure which the crawling node can be scaled up in seconds.
  • Data processing use the state-of-art big data processing frameworks, including Kafka, Elasticsearch, and Spark Streaming. Kafka cluster worked as a data bus store parsed webpage content. Spark streaming consumes the data from the Kafka pipeline and predicts the public sentiment from the social media post. Elasticsearch is mainly responsible for the full-text retrieval. The system processes 16 GB streaming data daily and control the data latency within 10 mintues.
  • The system provided a RESTful API endpoint for managing crawler's task and retrive sentiment factor based on stock number. The backend system is using beego framework (Golang).

    • A block-chain based content addressable storage for patching purpose

    Oracle Asia R&D-Shenzhen
    2018-Present

    The patching tool supports block-chain and content addressable storage. Block-chain provides a retrievable file change chain. File change chain can guarantee non-repudiation, tampering the data, spoofing the data. Content Addressable Storage provides file fingerprint, which can be used for irrefutable authenticity and decrease duplication files. The new patching flow optimizes time-consuming, security and auditability in the patching process.

    Rancher Flat network project (Phoenix Research Center,USA)

    Rancher Labs Inc.,Phoenix,USA
    2017

    (SDN) Rancher Flat network project based on Container Network Interface for Container Cloud, which gain 99% hardware bandwidth. The Flat network plugin implements the IP allocation for the containers and the container network connectivity. The containers , Virtual Machines and baremetal machines can access to each other and they are in the same subnet and network hierachy.

  • Developing tools and language:Golang, Container Network Interface, Linux network namespace
    • Rancher Flat Network documentation Flat Network Demo Setup
